attributes.action: Theresa May should appoint a panel of experts to head child sex abuse investigation. If not she should resign.
attributes.additional_details:
It is an insult to the victims that the two people Theresa May appointed to head the child sex abuse scandal are connected.

First the sister of a judge who is accused of helping cover up for paedophiles, and then a lady who is a friend of an alleged paedophile.

A panel of experts should be appointed or Theresa May should resign.
